body_html:
I've upgraded my IPython to 5.4.1 and switched to Python 2.7.6 and it works for me either way (saving to a file or as written in the tutorial) on Linux.

By "for my ios", do you mean you're on a Mac? That would in fact be a bug if there's a platform dependency. If so please open a new bug. We may just need to switch it to matplotlib or something. Bonus points if you follow up with a pull request which makes the tutorial work cross-platform.
body_text:
I've upgraded my IPython to 5.4.1 and switched to Python 2.7.6 and it works for me either way (saving to a file or as written in the tutorial) on Linux.
By "for my ios", do you mean you're on a Mac? That would in fact be a bug if there's a platform dependency. If so please open a new bug. We may just need to switch it to matplotlib or something. Bonus points if you follow up with a pull request which makes the tutorial work cross-platform.
body:
I've upgraded my IPython to 5.4.1 and switched to Python 2.7.6 and it works for me either way (saving to a file or as written in the tutorial) on Linux.

By "for my ios", do you mean you're on a Mac? That would in fact be a bug if there's a platform dependency. If so please open a new bug. We may just need to switch it to matplotlib or something. Bonus points if you follow up with a pull request which makes the tutorial work cross-platform.
